Description: PROBLEM,,,,,,, PLEASE READ The input jack will cut in and out at times when a cord is inserted,,,, I think the jack will need to be soldered or repaired The selector does not work in the middle position,, so I think the middle pickup is bad and will need to be fixed The rear phase switch seems like it does nothing,,,,, The front phase switch works The wiring will need to be fixed~ Could be a simple wire fix,, could be a very difficult wire fix,, I really do not know ~~~~~~ Serial Number: K810494 So I believe this guitar is a 1980 or 1981 model ~~~~~ The guitar displays fine as shown in the pictures If you look closely you'll notice a good amount of nicks, scuffs and scratches throughout the body and neck, please see pictures The brass finish is pitting and showing its age The screws are rusting also showing their age The strings are rusty The guitar has a very bad smell of mildew After all this guitar is around 35+ years old My friend who plays guitar tested it out and this is what he told me: The new owner WILL NEED to give it a general maintenance set up to their playing specifications along with fixing the wiring The guitar does not have a case or bag My pictures represent how this guitar looks on display from 3' feet away in a well lit room USA BIDDERS ONLY,,, I CANNOT SHIP THIS GUITAR OVERSEAS Shipping weight is between 14 and 15 pounds
Title: Ibanez 1980 or 1981 Blazer Series Guitar Vintage Made in Japan ~USA BIDDERS ONLY
